country.spain.metaDesc: Browse leading doctors in Spain. Filter by clinic, department and city.
country.spain.title: Spain — Doctors Directory
country.spain.subtitle: Information-only catalog. Quirónsalud network (Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Málaga, Alicante) and Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona.
country.spain.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, specialty, or clinic
country.spain.sort.name: Name
country.spain.empty: No matches. Try changing filters or query.
country.spain.emptyHint: Try another city, clinic or specialty.
country.spain.usp.expertsDesc: We shortlist department heads and leaders of specialized units.
country.spain.usp.safeDesc: Clear coordination, documents in your language, no marketing contracts.
country.spain.usp.careDesc: Personal guidance from the first message to your return home.
country.spain.pitch.title: Not sure which doctor is right for you?
country.spain.pitch.subtitle: Tell me about the diagnosis and preferences. I’ll match you with the right department head, prepare the request, and help you get a quick reply from the clinic.

people.doctors.huqm-cabrera-cardiology.t: Head of Cardiology — Hospital Universitario Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-cabrera-cardiology.b: Renowned electrophysiologist specializing in atrial fibrillation ablation. Leads cardiology at Quirónsalud Madrid, Ruber Juan Bravo, and Olympia Medical Center.
people.doctors.huqm-datino-cardiology.bi: Specialist in cardiac electrophysiology and catheter ablation of complex arrhythmias, with focus on minimally invasive rhythm correction.
people.doctors.huqm-gonzalez-cortijo-onc: Head of Medical Oncology — Hospital Universitario Quirónsalud Madrid
Leads the multidisciplinary oncology department. Expert in breast cancer, clinical research, and personalized treatment protocols.
people.doctors.huqm-boni-oncology.name: Dr. Valentina Boni
people.doctors.huqm-boni-oncology.title: Medical Oncologist — Phase I Clinical Trials Unit, Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-boni-oncology.bio: Specialist in early-phase oncology drug development and first-in-human clinical trials. Focuses on targeted and immunotherapy research.
people.doctors.huqm-gil-robles-neurosurg: Head of Neurosurgery — Hospital Universitario Quirónsalud Madrid
Internationally recognized neurosurgeon specializing in brain tumor and neuro-oncology surgery. Pioneer in intraoperative brain mapping and awake surgery.
people.doctors.huqm-ley-neurosurgery.bio: Performs advanced cranial and spinal surgeries. Experienced in minimally invasive techniques and neurological trauma treatment.
people.doctors.huqm-tabuenca-ortho.name: Dr. José Tabuenca Dumortier
people.doctors.huqm-tabuenca-ortho.title: Head of Orthopedics and Traumatology — Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-tabuenca-ortho.bio: Leads the Orthopedics & Traumatology Department with subspecialties in hip, knee, shoulder, hand, foot, and ankle surgery.
people.doctors.huqm-trigo-ortho.name: Dr. Luis Trigo Lahoz
people.doctors.huqm-trigo-ortho.title: Orthopedic Surgeon — Shoulder & Elbow Unit, Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-trigo-ortho.bio: Expert in arthroscopic and reconstructive surgery of the shoulder and elbow. Focuses on sports injuries and joint restoration.
people.doctors.huqm-juzgado-gastro.name: Dr. Diego Juzgado de Lucas
people.doctors.huqm-juzgado-gastro.title: Head of Gastroenterology and Endoscopy — Hospital Universitario Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-juzgado-gastro.bio: Leads the Gastroenterology and Endoscopy Department. Expert in advanced endoscopy, FibroScan diagnostics, and liver disease management.
people.doctors.huqm-vazquez-sequeiros-ga: Associate Head of Gastroenterology — Quirónsalud Madrid
Specialist in therapeutic endoscopy and complex biliary-pancreatic interventions. Performs ERCP, EUS, and interventional procedures.
people.doctors.huqm-jodar-endo.name: Dr. Esteban Jódar Gimeno
people.doctors.huqm-jodar-endo.title: Head of Endocrinology, Diabetes and Nutrition — Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-jodar-endo.bio: Leads the Endocrinology Department. Expert in diabetes, obesity, and thyroid disorders. Develops patient-centered education and metabolic programs.
people.doctors.huqm-perez-arroyo-endo.ti: Associate Head of Endocrinology — Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-perez-arroyo-endo.bi: Focuses on diabetes management, nutritional therapy, and therapeutic education. Works within multidisciplinary endocrine care teams.
people.doctors.huqm-merello-gs.name: Dr. Jesús Merello Godino
people.doctors.huqm-merello-gs.title: Head of General Surgery — Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-merello-gs.bio: Leads the General Surgery Department. Specialist in gastrointestinal, laparoscopic, and complex abdominal procedures.
people.doctors.huqm-fernandez-luengas-gs: General and Bariatric Surgeon — Quirónsalud Madrid
Performs advanced laparoscopic and bariatric surgeries. Focuses on minimally invasive treatment of digestive disorders and obesity.
people.doctors.huqm-delgado-neph-transpl: Leads the Nephrology Department. Expert in renal replacement therapy, kidney transplantation, and chronic renal disease management.
people.doctors.huqm-praga-neph-transplan: Specialist in chronic kidney disease, glomerulopathies, and long-term post-transplant care. Provides advanced renal follow-up programs.
people.doctors.huqm-martinez-vega-radiol: Head of Diagnostic Imaging — Hospital Universitario Quirónsalud Madrid
Leads the Diagnostic Imaging Department. Expert in MRI, CT, and comprehensive image-guided diagnostics for complex cases.
people.doctors.huqm-casasco-vir.name: Dr. Alfredo Casasco
people.doctors.huqm-casasco-vir.title: Interventional Radiologist — Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-casasco-vir.bio: Performs endovascular and embolization procedures. Specialist in minimally invasive image-guided interventions.
people.doctors.huqm-del-cerro-radonco.ti: Head of Radiation Oncology — Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-del-cerro-radonco.bi: Expert in external beam radiotherapy and brachytherapy. Leads treatment programs using the TrueBeam linear accelerator platform.
Associate Head of Radiation Oncology — Quirónsalud Madrid
Specialist in precision radiotherapy techniques ensuring targeted dose delivery while protecting healthy tissue.
people.doctors.huqm-cabanas-pediatrics.b: Leads the Pediatric and Neonatal Departments. Expert in neonatal intensive care, perinatal diagnosis, and pediatric emergencies.
people.doctors.huqm-pellicer-neonatology: Associate Head of Neonatology — Quirónsalud Madrid
Coordinates NICU operations and complex neonatal care. Specialist in premature infant support and neonatal pathology.
people.doctors.huqm-gosalvez-ivf.name: Dr. Antonio Gosálvez Vega
people.doctors.huqm-gosalvez-ivf.title: Director of the Assisted Reproduction Unit — Quirónsalud Madrid
people.doctors.huqm-gosalvez-ivf.bio: Leads IVF programs at Quirónsalud Madrid and San José. Gynecologist specialized in reproductive medicine, fertility, and egg donation.
people.doctors.hqv-merenciano-cardiology: Specialist in clinical cardiology, echocardiography, and heart failure management. Provides comprehensive cardiovascular care.
people.doctors.hqv-ferrero-arrhythmia.na: Dr. Ángel Ferrero de Loma Osorio
people.doctors.hqv-ferrero-arrhythmia.ti: Electrophysiologist — Arrhythmia and Pacemaker Unit, Quirónsalud Valencia
people.doctors.hqv-ferrero-arrhythmia.bi: Expert in diagnosis and treatment of cardiac rhythm disorders. Performs ablation and device therapy, including pacemakers and defibrillators.
people.doctors.hqv-sempere-gastro.name: Dr. Javier Sempere García-Argüelles
people.doctors.hqv-sempere-gastro.title: Gastroenterologist — Digestive Diseases Department, Quirónsalud Valencia
people.doctors.hqv-sempere-gastro.bio: Specialist in digestive endoscopy, intestinal pathology, and chronic gastrointestinal disorders. Provides advanced endoscopic diagnostics.
people.doctors.hqv-sanchiz-gastro.name: Dr. Vicente Sanchiz Soler
people.doctors.hqv-sanchiz-gastro.title: Gastroenterologist — Quirónsalud Valencia
people.doctors.hqv-sanchiz-gastro.bio: Specialist in hepatology and digestive system diseases. Provides advanced endoscopic and liver diagnostic care.
people.doctors.hqv-flor-gs.name: Dr. Blas Flor Lorente
people.doctors.hqv-flor-gs.title: General and Gastrointestinal Surgeon — Quirónsalud Valencia
people.doctors.hqv-flor-gs.bio: Performs gastrointestinal and abdominal surgery using minimally invasive and laparoscopic techniques.
people.doctors.hqv-paya-gs.name: Dra. Carmen Payá Llorente
people.doctors.hqv-paya-gs.title: General Surgeon — Quirónsalud Valencia
people.doctors.hqv-paya-gs.bio: Specialist in abdominal and digestive surgery with experience in advanced laparoscopic procedures.
people.doctors.hqv-marti-radiology.name: Dr. Luis Martí-Bonmatí
people.doctors.hqv-marti-radiology.title: Head of Radiology — Quirónsalud Valencia
people.doctors.hqv-marti-radiology.bio: Leads the Radiology Department. Internationally recognized expert in MRI, CT, and image-guided diagnostics and research.
people.doctors.hqm-agustin-cataldo-cardi: Specialist in clinical cardiology and non-invasive heart diagnostics. Provides patient-centered cardiovascular care.
people.doctors.hqm-alberto-barrera-cardi: Expert in echocardiography and clinical management of cardiac diseases. Focuses on early diagnosis and preventive cardiology.
people.doctors.hqm-jose-antonio-trujillo: General and Digestive Surgeon — Quirónsalud Málaga
Specialist in general and digestive surgery with emphasis on minimally invasive techniques. Also part of the hospital’s medical leadership team.
people.doctors.hqm-cesar-ramirez-gs.name: Dr. César Pablo Ramírez Plaza
people.doctors.hqm-cesar-ramirez-gs.titl: General and Oncologic Surgeon — Quirónsalud Málaga
people.doctors.hqm-cesar-ramirez-gs.bio: Performs oncologic surgery of the colon, rectum, and thyroid. Distinguished member of Quirónsalud Málaga’s surgical department.
people.doctors.hqm-alba-castano-radiolog: Specialist in diagnostic radiology with expertise in oncologic imaging and advanced MRI interpretation.
people.doctors.hqm-alba-merchan-radiolog: Expert in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and computed tomography (CT). Provides comprehensive diagnostic imaging services.
people.doctors.hqm-beatriz-medina-endocr: Specialist in endocrinology and clinical nutrition. Focuses on diabetes, thyroid disorders, and metabolic health management.
people.doctors.hqm-carmen-hardy-endocrin: Expert in metabolism and complex endocrine disorders. Provides personalized hormonal and nutritional therapy in Málaga.
people.doctors.hqm-juan-luis-alcazar-ivf: Gynecologist and IVF Specialist — Quirónsalud Málaga
Leads assisted reproduction and infertility programs. Experienced in IVF, ICSI, and advanced reproductive techniques.
people.doctors.hqm-luis-alonso-pacheco-i: IVF Specialist — Reproductive Medicine Unit, Quirónsalud Málaga
Performs in vitro fertilization and fertility treatments. Focuses on reproductive support and personalized patient care.
people.doctors.qa-pascual-cardiology.bio: Member of the comprehensive cardiology team at Quirónsalud Alicante. Provides diagnosis and treatment of heart disease.
people.doctors.qa-hortelano-cardiology.b: Specialist in cardiovascular diseases and preventive diagnostics. Focuses on heart health, arrhythmia management, and hypertension control.
people.doctors.qa-inigo-gastro.name: Dra. Almudena Íñigo Chaves
people.doctors.qa-inigo-gastro.title: Gastroenterologist — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-inigo-gastro.bio: Specialist in digestive system diseases and endoscopic procedures. Provides comprehensive gastroenterology care.
people.doctors.qa-pascualmora-gastro.tit: Gastroenterologist — Digestive Diseases Unit, Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-pascualmora-gastro.bio: Expert in digestive disorders and endoscopic treatments. Offers personalized management of gastrointestinal diseases.
people.doctors.qa-roscomesana-gs.name: Dr. Alejandro Ros Comesaña
people.doctors.qa-roscomesana-gs.title: General and Digestive Surgeon — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-roscomesana-gs.bio: Performs general and digestive surgery with a focus on minimally invasive abdominal procedures.
people.doctors.qa-farre-onco.name: Dr. José Farré Alegre
people.doctors.qa-farre-onco.title: Surgical Oncologist — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-farre-onco.bio: Specialist in oncologic surgery with a multidisciplinary approach to tumor treatment and postoperative care.
people.doctors.qa-maehr-ortho.name: Dr. Alban Maehr
people.doctors.qa-maehr-ortho.title: Orthopedic Surgeon — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-maehr-ortho.bio: Specialist in traumatology and orthopedic surgery. Focuses on musculoskeletal injuries and joint reconstruction.
people.doctors.qa-salvador-ortho.name: Dr. Jorge Salvador Marín
people.doctors.qa-salvador-ortho.title: Orthopedic and Trauma Surgeon — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-salvador-ortho.bio: Expert in orthopedic surgery and rehabilitation. Provides surgical care for fractures, sports injuries, and joint disorders.
people.doctors.qa-hernandez-radiology.ti: Head of Diagnostic Imaging — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-hernandez-radiology.bi: Leads the diagnostic imaging service. Expert in radiodiagnosis, MRI, CT, and digital imaging technologies.
people.doctors.qa-pla-radiology.name: Dr. Fernando Pla Mingorance
people.doctors.qa-pla-radiology.title: Radiologist — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-pla-radiology.bio: Specialist in magnetic resonance and advanced imaging techniques for accurate diagnostic assessment.
people.doctors.qa-maestre-neuro.name: Dr. José Joaquín Maestre Gil
people.doctors.qa-maestre-neuro.title: Neurosurgeon — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-maestre-neuro.bio: Member of the Neurosciences Unit specializing in brain and spinal surgery. Focuses on minimally invasive neurosurgical techniques.
people.doctors.qa-puell-neuro.name: Dr. Carlos Israel Puell Horta
people.doctors.qa-puell-neuro.title: Neurosurgeon — Quirónsalud Alicante
people.doctors.qa-puell-neuro.bio: Expert in neurosurgery and central nervous system tract disorders. Provides surgical management of brain and spinal pathologies.
Specialist in endocrinology and nutrition. Provides diagnosis and management of hormonal and metabolic disorders.
people.doctors.qa-cid-endocrinology.name: Dr. Jorge Cid Pérez
people.doctors.qa-cid-endocrinology.bio: Specialist in diabetes, obesity, and metabolic diseases. Offers preventive and therapeutic endocrine care.
people.doctors.sjd-mora-oncology.name: Dr. Jaume Mora Graupera
people.doctors.sjd-mora-oncology.title: Pediatric Oncologist — Hospital Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-mora-oncology.bio: Director of Pediatric Oncology. Researcher in childhood tumorigenesis and precision therapies for rare cancers.
people.doctors.sjd-rives-hematology.name: Dra. Susana Rives Sola
people.doctors.sjd-rives-hematology.titl: Pediatric Hematologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-rives-hematology.bio: Specialist in pediatric hematologic disorders and immune deficiencies. Leads innovative therapies for childhood leukemia.
people.doctors.sjd-hinojosa-neurosurgery: Pediatric Neurosurgeon — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
Specialist in pediatric neuro-oncology, tethered cord, and craniofacial surgery. Performs advanced microsurgical procedures.
people.doctors.sjd-fons-neurology.name: Dra. Maria Carme Fons Estupiñà
people.doctors.sjd-fons-neurology.title: Pediatric Neurologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-fons-neurology.bio: Pediatric neurologist specializing in developmental disorders, epilepsy, and neurogenetic diseases.
people.doctors.sjd-prada-cardiology.name: Dr. Fredy Hermógenes Prada Martínez
people.doctors.sjd-prada-cardiology.titl: Pediatric Cardiologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-prada-cardiology.bio: Specialist in congenital heart diseases and long-term pediatric cardiac follow-up. Provides advanced pediatric cardiology care.
Pediatric Cardiologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
Expert in pediatric arrhythmias and congenital cardiology. Member of the Brugada family, pioneers in inherited heart rhythm disorders.
people.doctors.sjd-parri-surgery.name: Dr. Francisco José Parri Ferrandis
people.doctors.sjd-parri-surgery.title: Pediatric and Pediatric Plastic Surgeon — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-parri-surgery.bio: Specialist in pediatric surgery and reconstructive procedures for congenital malformations. Focuses on minimally invasive techniques.
people.doctors.sjd-krauel-surgery.name: Dr. Lucas Krauel Giménez-Salinas
people.doctors.sjd-krauel-surgery.title: Pediatric Surgeon — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-krauel-surgery.bio: Expert in pediatric oncology surgery and minimally invasive techniques. Leads innovative programs in pediatric surgical oncology.
people.doctors.sjd-carrasco-surgery.name: Dra. Rosalía Carrasco Torrents
people.doctors.sjd-carrasco-surgery.titl: Pediatric Thoracic and Plastic Surgeon — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-carrasco-surgery.bio: Specialist in pediatric thoracic and reconstructive surgery. Focuses on congenital malformations and oncologic procedures.
people.doctors.sjd-garciaapu-urology.tit: Pediatric Urologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-garciaapu-urology.bio: Specialist in pediatric urology treating hydronephrosis, vesicoureteral reflux, and hypospadias. Performs minimally invasive procedures.
people.doctors.sjd-galofontecha-ortho.ti: Pediatric Orthopedic Surgeon and Traumatologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-galofontecha-ortho.bi: Expert in pediatric orthopedics and trauma. Focuses on limb deformities, musculoskeletal disorders, and scoliosis correction.
people.doctors.sjd-alberti-otorhinolaryn: Pediatric ENT (Otolaryngologist) — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
Pediatric ENT specialist with expertise in auditory, airway, and craniofacial pathologies. Provides multidisciplinary ENT care.
people.doctors.sjd-alsina-immunology.nam: Dra. Laia Alsina Manrique de Lara
people.doctors.sjd-alsina-immunology.tit: Pediatric Immunologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-alsina-immunology.bio: Clinical pediatric immunologist specializing in immune and autoimmune diseases. Leads research in primary immunodeficiencies.
people.doctors.sjd-climent-neurophysiolo: Clinical Neurophysiologist and Developmental Specialist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
Specialist in pediatric neurophysiology and developmental neurodiagnostics, focusing on early detection of neurodevelopmental disorders.
people.doctors.sjd-colome-neuropsycholog: Pediatric Neuropsychologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
Expert in cognitive development, learning disorders, and pediatric neuropsychological evaluation.
people.doctors.sjd-cols-pulmonology.name: Dra. Maria Cols Roig
people.doctors.sjd-cols-pulmonology.titl: Pediatric Pulmonologist — Sant Joan de Déu Barcelona
people.doctors.sjd-cols-pulmonology.bio: Specialist in pediatric respiratory medicine and chronic lung diseases. Provides comprehensive care for asthma and rare pulmonary disorders.
people.doctors.hqb-llado-neurology.name: Dra. Ana Lladó Carbó
people.doctors.hqb-llado-neurology.title: Head of Neurology — Quirónsalud Barcelona
people.doctors.hqb-llado-neurology.bio: Head of Neurology at Quirónsalud Barcelona. Specialist in stroke, multiple sclerosis, and neurodegenerative disorders.
people.doctors.hqb-garcia-pascual-neurol: Specialist in epilepsy and demyelinating diseases of the central nervous system. Provides advanced neurological diagnostics.
people.doctors.hqb-hernandez-neurophysio: Expert in EEG, EMG, and sleep studies. Member of the Clinical Neurophysiology Department providing electrophysiological diagnostics.
people.doctors.hqb-martinez-neurophysiol: Performs neurophysiological diagnostics for epilepsy, neuropathies, and sleep disorders. Focuses on precise functional mapping.
people.doctors.hqb-gispert-psychiatry.bi: Specialist in adult psychiatry focusing on depression, anxiety, and affective disorders. Provides evidence-based mental health care.
people.doctors.hqb-sanchez-psychiatry.ti: Child and Adolescent Psychiatrist — Quirónsalud Barcelona
people.doctors.hqb-sanchez-psychiatry.bi: Expert in child and adolescent psychiatry, specializing in ADHD, autism spectrum disorders, and emotional development.
people.doctors.hqb-girbau-dermatology.bi: Head of Dermatology. Specialist in dermatologic surgery and inflammatory skin diseases such as psoriasis and atopic dermatitis.
people.doctors.hqb-sierra-dermatology.bi: Specialist in aesthetic dermatology, laser therapy, and skin rejuvenation. Provides advanced cosmetic and medical skin care.
people.doctors.hqb-rodriguez-pulmonology: Expert in respiratory diseases, asthma, and sleep-related breathing disorders. Provides pulmonary function and sleep studies.
Specialist in COPD, chronic bronchitis, and respiratory rehabilitation. Offers long-term management of pulmonary conditions.
Specialist in clinical epileptology, EEG monitoring, and epilepsy surgery. Focuses on refractory and complex seizure disorders.
people.doctors.hqb-rodriguez-epileptolog: Neurologist — Pediatric and Adult Epileptology, Quirónsalud Barcelona
Provides comprehensive treatment for complex epilepsy and neurophysiological diagnostics across pediatric and adult cases.
people.doctors.hqb-minguez-hematology.bi: Specialist in clinical hematology, leukemias, and blood disorders. Collaborates with IOB Institute of Oncology on integrative care.
Expert in lymphomas, multiple myeloma, and malignant hematologic diseases. Focuses on personalized oncohematologic therapies.
people.doctors.hqb-lloveras-nuclear.name: Dr. José Lloveras Rubio
people.doctors.hqb-lloveras-nuclear.titl: Head of Nuclear Medicine — Quirónsalud Barcelona
people.doctors.hqb-lloveras-nuclear.bio: Head of Nuclear Medicine. Responsible for PET-CT and advanced functional imaging for oncology and metabolic diagnostics.
people.doctors.hqb-escalona-nuclear.name: Dra. María Escalona García
people.doctors.hqb-escalona-nuclear.titl: Specialist in Nuclear Medicine — Quirónsalud Barcelona
people.doctors.hqb-escalona-nuclear.bio: Expert in molecular imaging and radiopharmaceutical therapy management (I-131, Lu-177, Ga-68). Focuses on functional diagnostic imaging.
people.doctors.hqb-torreblanca-ophthalmo: Ophthalmologist — Retina and Cataract Surgery, Quirónsalud Barcelona
Specialist in retinal and cataract surgery. Provides advanced diagnostic imaging and microsurgical vision treatments.
people.doctors.hqb-perez-montes-ophthalm: Ophthalmologist — Cornea and Glaucoma Specialist, Quirónsalud Barcelona
Expert in corneal surgery and chronic glaucoma management. Performs refractive and ocular surface reconstruction procedures.
Specialist in clinical nephrology, hypertension, and chronic kidney disease. Provides preventive and renal replacement care.
people.doctors.hqb-gomez-nephrology.name: Dra. Ana Gómez Ortiz
people.doctors.hqb-gomez-nephrology.bio: Focuses on renal insufficiency, nephropathies, and post-transplant patient follow-up. Provides multidisciplinary renal care.
people.doctors.hqb-lledo-urology.name: Dr. Eusebio Lledó García
people.doctors.hqb-lledo-urology.title: Head of Urology — Quirónsalud Barcelona
people.doctors.hqb-lledo-urology.bio: Head of the Urology Department. Expert in laparoscopic surgery, onco-urology, and andrology. Performs complex prostate and kidney procedures.
people.doctors.hqb-caballero-urology.tit: Urologist — Minimally Invasive Surgery, Quirónsalud Barcelona
people.doctors.hqb-caballero-urology.bio: Specialist in prostate surgery and minimally invasive urologic techniques. Focuses on precision and patient recovery.
people.doctors.seville-adolfo-lopez-gome: Head of Gynecology and Obstetrics — Quirónsalud Seville
Leads the Department of Gynecology and Obstetrics. Specialist in fertility disorders, laparoscopic surgery, and management of high-risk pregnancies.
people.doctors.seville-agustina-moreno-m: Specialist in reproductive medicine and female hormonal disorders. Provides personalized infertility treatment and advanced gynecologic care.
people.doctors.seville-adrian-revello-bu: Specialist in interventional cardiology and ischemic heart disease. Performs diagnostic catheterization, angioplasty, and preventive cardiology programs.
people.doctors.seville-javier-marquez-ca: Expert in coronary interventions, cardiac imaging, and rhythm management. Focuses on angioplasty and hypertension treatment.
people.doctors.seville-aguas-santas-sanc: Specialist in cataract, glaucoma, and refractive surgery. Provides advanced ophthalmic diagnostics and corneal disease treatment.
people.doctors.seville-miguel-fernandez-: Focuses on retinal and macular disorders, glaucoma, and diabetic retinopathy. Performs laser and microsurgical eye procedures.
people.doctors.seville-abdul-razack-gene: General and Digestive Surgeon — Quirónsalud Seville
Performs laparoscopic and minimally invasive procedures for gallbladder, hernia, and gastrointestinal diseases.
people.doctors.seville-alberto-del-valle: Specialist in minimally invasive abdominal and digestive surgery. Works within multidisciplinary teams for complex surgical cases.
people.doctors.seville-abraham-garcia-me: Orthopedic and Trauma Surgeon — Quirónsalud Seville
Specialist in joint replacement, arthroscopy, and sports traumatology. Provides surgical and conservative treatment for musculoskeletal injuries.
people.doctors.seville-clara-martinez-or: Treats fractures, ligament injuries, and sports trauma. Experienced in both pediatric and adult orthopedics with focus on functional recovery.
people.doctors.seville-maria-jose-lirola: Leads pediatric services within the Materno-Infantil Unit. Specialist in preventive pediatrics, allergies, and chronic disease management.
people.doctors.seville-ana-garcia-pediat: Provides neonatal and developmental care. Focuses on respiratory infections, child nutrition, and preventive vaccination programs.
people.doctors.seville-carlos-ruiz-oncol: Expert in chemotherapy, immunotherapy, and targeted cancer treatment. Designs personalized care plans for solid tumor patients.
people.doctors.seville-laura-gomez-oncol: Specializes in breast and gastrointestinal oncology. Provides multidisciplinary cancer management and long-term patient follow-up.
people.doctors.seville-ricardo-martin-ne: Performs brain and spine microsurgery for tumors, herniated discs, and nerve compression. Applies advanced neurosurgical techniques.
people.doctors.seville-isabel-martinez-n: Specialist in spine and peripheral nerve surgery. Provides multidisciplinary care for traumatic and degenerative neurological conditions.
people.doctors.seville-javier-sanchez-ur: Specialist in prostate and urinary tract disorders. Performs endoscopic and minimally invasive urologic surgery for optimal recovery.
people.doctors.seville-marta-lopez-urolo: Specialist in kidney and bladder diseases, including stone management and female urology. Performs diagnostic and functional ultrasound studies.
people.doctors.seville-antonio-castro-de: Treats chronic skin conditions such as psoriasis, eczema, and dermatitis. Experienced in dermatosurgery, mole mapping, and skin cancer screening.
people.doctors.seville-silvia-garcia-der: Specialist in aesthetic dermatology and laser therapy. Provides treatments for acne, pigmentation, scars, and skin rejuvenation.
people.doctors.seville-diego-rodriguez-g: Specialist in digestive tract and liver disorders. Performs endoscopy, colonoscopy, and management of reflux and inflammatory bowel disease.
people.doctors.seville-noelia-martin-gas: Focuses on hepatology and pancreatic disorders. Experienced in metabolic-liver diseases and advanced endoscopic diagnostics.
people.doctors.seville-fernando-ruiz-end: Expert in diabetes, thyroid disease, and obesity management. Provides hormonal balance therapy and preventive endocrine consultations.
people.doctors.seville-maria-gonzalez-en: Specialist in metabolic, thyroid, and pituitary disorders. Offers personalized nutrition and hormonal therapy for endocrine health.
